documents.document: Alrighty then. Let’s do this. #ButterflyEffect #Butterfly #ITVButterfly https://t.co/VvR7niQ2sL

God i am so excited for #Butterfly #Butterfly #ITVButterfly. I have tissues, a pillow (to hide behind when it hurts) and will make a mug of milky coffee to sip. It is rare that i turn th TV on, but this is a must watch. xx
@Divine_Goth @lisasevern the 3 daftigos
@lisasevern Yeah, thats the word i was looking for. Hey hang on, that makes me double daft as i went yesteday as well. 😉
@piersmorgan Such a drama queen Piers.
@IndiaWilloughby I had my #butterfly in 2007. Back then I had no idea how to fly. But I knew I would one day. #ButterflyEffect so excited for tonight. #Believe https://t.co/M8wTFjvgHz
@lisasevern You are strong, determined and super human.......
@TraceyJustRocks Wow x
So I nailed the 5km treadmill. 26:37. It was really hard. And the weight today. 74.9kg about 11st11lbs so a couple of pounds up on my August weigh in. #Believe https://t.co/qfCkcdrxJb
Weight update - 9 months since i started to diet. https://t.co/jNaKm3OM4H
Off to see #Venom today.. If only #TomHardy's tongue was really that long eh 🙃 https://t.co/6jphwjkEXY
@lisasevern @jaynejaynio Ewe, like I cant guess the second x
@Lindsey_J0nes Thanks lovely. Brutal but only what I knew. X
I am just about to go out on my own to a bar, across at the marina, on my own. I have had to have a gin for Dutch courage. https://t.co/Ntg2T0LLXg

I was out shopping earlier for some new work trousers ( the others are too big). Anyhow I was trying on some other stuff and the changing room gave me this side on view that I don’t get to see. My first thought was, ‘you need a trachea shave now’. Am I being too critical? https://t.co/tc9X73ws9U
The lul before the storm. #circuittraining https://t.co/KTvcsHR9aA
@lisasevern I have to say “that is absolute bollocks” 😂
I have walked up and down my stairs so many times this morning as I keep forgetting stuff. What’s your favourite swear word to yourself when you are on your own? Mine appears to be “oh bollocks!”
#GwiththeT xx❤️xx https://t.co/uB1zFNtuEq
Gate crashing the hubbies date night. We are off to see #AStarIsBorn I have tissues. https://t.co/vwDoUQ9OmQ
Gazing out of my bedroom window watching the masts on the boats in the marina sway from side to side in the wind. It’s making me feel all wobbly. https://t.co/v839hIv3Xw
@RachaelUnedited Awe thanks lovely and yes it did. I was well prepared x
@Divine_Goth @lisasevern Lovely! Now don’t tantrum. You know it makes sense. X
@lisasevern @Divine_Goth My thoughts exakly. Victoria is due a makeover 😂
@lisasevern @Divine_Goth Oh Lisa, don’t you think she would look sooo pretty in pink? 😂😂😂
@Divine_Goth @lisasevern Dark northerners, that’s what you both are. I need to introduce colour into your lives. 😉
@Divine_Goth You beat me hands down. #DressDownFriday https://t.co/LBqtPn0adv
@jaynejaynio @Red_Amber I am all coffee’d out to be honest. But the important thing is that the presentation is ready. 😊 now I just have to be grilled 😐
That feeling when you have a report to finish for an 08:30 meeting and the only way is to just get up, about 3 minutes before you fall to sleep to get it finished.... 😐 https://t.co/SsbtvyWKER
@Andra_me_uk How long you down for?
@TraceyJustRocks Thanks lovely. X
@TraceyJustRocks When is the programme on and what channel? X
@Lindsey_J0nes You little minx x
@_NatashaDevon "Does this box have a leak?" "Eeeek, oh yes, I am so sorry. I hope that stain come off the doorstep."
@KatyMontgomerie I did. I was prepared to take vacation time but they said no and to take medical leave.
@tabbikatuk It doesn’t have to be ‘when’. We are all different. But if it needs to be then you can do anything you believe in. Thank you for reading x
@jaynejaynio Denzel Washington has a son! See this is why I am on twitter. I pick up these nuggets of trivia every waking moment🙃
This was the film..... https://t.co/P4MjcU3sL3
Just watched #Vacancy with @KateBeckinsale and #LukeWilson. I kept thinking all the way through, that's gotta be a relation to #OwenWilson. Turns out it's his brother. Why did I not know that anyway!
@sharon1stperson Awe bless you. Keep the faith girl friend x
@Lindsey_J0nes Happy tears x
@Lindsey_J0nes Awe thanks Lindsey. So kind x

If you are in a period of self hatred or self loathing, whatever your demons are, then believe in yourself. Show an inner strength. If I can do what I have done then anyone can. I now believe that anything is possible if you believe in yourself. xx https://t.co/4KPuZCG6l9
@dotrve well I plan to have my first bath since moving down to Pompey (dirty bitch), finish a blog I am writing, get my car cleaned, go get some food and watch a movie.
@dotrve mind you, when I was driving round the 25 last night to go home and my leg was cramping, I was feeling pretty inadequate lol.
@dotrve dont be daft x
@dotrve why limit yourself to just one of those things. Just do it all. x
@jaynejaynio One of my favourite films ever x
I plan to be all filmed out this Christmas. Three more days before I interact face to face with another human (apart from the gym) and my drawer of unwatched movies is shrinking.
…. in other news, my legs are killing me. 3rd gym session in consecutive days complete. One more tomorrow. Merry Christmas everyone x

"You've changed". Crap, if I had a pound for everyone who was once close to me I would be a rich woman. What I would like to say to those people, given the opportunity is "take a look in the mirror, you f#cking hypocrite". How long does one bite ones lip? Rant over for today....
@Naddy37 I’ll break a nail. 😱
@Dervlen Think I will just continue to scream quietly x

Does anyone ever have a crazed desire to just scream and rant but hold back, knowing that it will just do no good whatsoever? The feeling when your head holds back that raw emotion? It sucks right? Quietly screaming....
@TraceyDontRock Good. X

@TraceyDontRock I get that but you need to care for your emotions too. On my call system we offload by calling a shift leader with the purpose being to make sure I am not carrying the weight of the world at the end of the shift. It’s a really good process. X
@TraceyDontRock Do you offload your emotions at the end of a shift?
@TraceyDontRock Just take time away from the phone lovely. Talk to your peers. They are tough. Virtual hug coming your way. X
@Divine_Goth Why thank you. 😕
I am so tired today. I can’t keep my eyes open. What is up with me.
@_NatashaDevon @normanlamb Clearly the eyes of Medusa... I would of had my shield to look only at you in reflection.

@lisasevern @NoNonperson @guardian I phoned my GPs today as my my need not to have a cervical smear did not transfer to my new surgery. All I said was my name and she said “oh yes you don’t need that, it’s just for women”. I reminded her that I was one, with no cervix. She apologised. Made me chuckle though.
@KaraLG84 I have no idea. But I think there maybe a coffee flavour to it. It has cream also. I’ll let you know at elevensies.
So this was on my desk when I arrived at work. It would be so rude not to share it right? https://t.co/7GsYyomtnx
@Divine_Goth @rvedotrc In this case it’s the sweet on savoury that’s wrong for me.
@rvedotrc @Divine_Goth Ham and pineapple. Wrong, wrong and wrong. 🤮
@StephanieHirst I once walked out of the toilet in a restaurant with my dress tucked in the top on my knickers!! 😱
After three consecutive days of after work gym classes it is safe to say that my legs are absolutely KILLING me! How is your mornings?
Massive current age pb today for the 5km treadmill. 1m 15s pb from last Saturday. https://t.co/9XfRXGQqvM

@IndiaWilloughby Whilst I endorse your thread, please don’t let a measure of how well we integrate into society solely be based on a media footprint. There are many professional people out there, myself included who integrate very successfully in their chosen field. #itscoming #believe

The good news. I slept really well last night. So life is not that bad eh. Now killing time, sipping coffee, waiting for my final appointment. I’ll let you into a little secret. Don’t tell anyone will you; I am home sick. X
@Divine_Goth Oh dear. I love soft cell. Does this mean I may have a smidgen if goth! 😱

Today I went swimming. The first time I have dived in a pool since, well a long time. Note to self; yes ir hair is sound, but omfg the bikini bottoms; I need a smaller size. 😂😂 https://t.co/sBm37WQ5Yu
@WonderKristine7 Haha. I covered them in cream. It was very liberating to be honest.
It’s my name. Simples... https://t.co/nb8m3tIQ9t
Well it took me 3 days but I finally plucked up the courage to go topless 😱 https://t.co/FgxcxVMKFK
The spin studio is empty so let’s do this thing. https://t.co/KExftTMEc3
Ok. So cycle it is. Thanks tweet peeps https://t.co/7aBkdH2pVX
@KatyMontgomerie @swimsoutheast 😂😂😂 awe baby girl, there is still time 😉
Just sorting out some old paperwork. I wonder how easy it would be to get my name changed on this certificate from June 1975? 😂. @swimsoutheast can you help? https://t.co/a9dUzjSuvc
in two hours in need to work out. Do I?...…..
@IndiaWilloughby @5_News Sure your time will come. What do they say; things happen for a reason.... or something like that. #Believe
@Red_Amber Keep safe Amber x

in other news - Work commute = 13 mins door to desk, 8 sets of traffic lights and 5 roundabouts. Not too bad. Oh, and my back, I cant stay sat down for more than 30 minutes without it seizing up. Not to good.

My first day back in the office as a permanent Pompey bird employee apart from the fact that my email inbox resembled a war zone, was pretty much the same as the last 10 months. Nought new there then.
@StephanieHirst Maybe we all just have wind and need burping 🙃

@ChrisCowlin @SpursOfficial Chris is your biggest ambassador and an absolute fanatic for the club. Please show that a big club CAN act with the agility and heart that it’s supporters crave. I know you can be better than this x
Work alarms. They suck right!
#DieHard 4.0 on @Film4 I just love these films. Bets not sleeping this evening right.
Oh crap, this is gonna be a hard, tough, must watch. BOY ERASED – Official Trailer [HD] – In Theaters November https://t.co/slhJUlSL9t via @YouTube

Thank you Beeb for promoting this . Have you seen the comments!! Now every trans woman will be viewed differently. Where is the unlike button on Twitter? So here is the news; there are bad people in all walks of life. https://t.co/HkMlwri00x
Not need to stress about breaking a nail anymore cos I just broke one 😢. That’s it, the work is ending! https://t.co/76J9DYjMVd
And still, an amazing voice. x
@BBCTheOneShow OMG @rickastley you look amazing. Now we should date 😍
@KaraLG84 I love it to. I always try to remember to put a little commentary on the photo's now. Will be nice to say hello on Saturday at Transpride x
Life is sort for this right. Higher and higher...... https://t.co/R8FqfJS1xw
For 37 working weeks..... https://t.co/oz3V46tQHb
@TraceyJustRocks And another night in a holiday inn. This time a freebie. I have more loyalty points than I can shake a stick at.
@TraceyJustRocks Of course I will be drinking gin. So that will help.
@TraceyJustRocks Well I will let you know how it goes x
